attribute.name: Title
attribute.value: Monthly version of HadISST sea surface temperature component

attribute.value: HadISST 1.1 monthly average sea surface temperature

attribute.name: reference
attribute.value: Rayner, N. A., Parker, D. E., Horton, E. B., Folland, C. K., Alexander, L. V., Rowell, D. P., Kent, E. C., Kaplan, A.
